item.title: 东证股息收益率跌破日本十年期国债收益率
item.description: 日本股市的股息收益率已跌破十年期国债收益率，这是至少二十年来首次出现这种情况，此前该国主权债务市场遭遇抛售。【原文：The dividend yield on Japanese stocks has dipped below the 10-year government bond yield for the first time in at least two decades, after the recent selloff in the nation’s sovereign debt market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所表示已知悉澳清用户连接问题
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司表示，已注意到有关报告称，部分使用批发债务证券结算平台Austraclear的用户在通过互联网连接时遇到问题。【原文：ASX Ltd. said it is aware of reports that some users of Austraclear, a platform for wholesale debt securities settlement, are encountering problems when connecting over the internet.】

item.title: 中国考虑收紧企业在香港上市的规则
item.description: 知情人士称，中国证券监管机构正考虑收紧内地企业赴港上市的准入标准，此前离岸融资热潮引发了对交易质量的担忧。【原文：China’s securities regulator is considering tightening the criteria for mainland companies to sell shares in Hong Kong, after an offshore fundraising boom raised concerns over deal quality, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Grab收购GoTo交易因持股方获国家支持而受阻
item.description: Grab控股有限公司计划斥资数十亿美元收购GoTo集团的交易遭遇了阻碍。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd.’s planned multibillion-dollar acquisition of GoTo Group has hit a stumbling block.】

item.title: 印度1月经济活动加速，PMI初值显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司的初步调查显示，尽管美国高关税对经济前景构成压力，但强劲的国内需求支撑着印度经济活动在1月份加速增长。【原文：India’s economic activity picked pace in January, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed, supported by robust domestic demand despite high US tariffs weighing on the economic outlook.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率连续第三个月保持稳定
item.description: 新加坡12月核心通胀率上升1.2%，连续第三个月保持相同涨幅，因食品和服务通胀保持稳定。【原文：Singapore’s core inflation rate rose 1.2% in December, maintaining the same pace for the third consecutive month as food and services inflation held steady.】

item.title: 特朗普H-1B签证政策混乱之际 美国顶尖科技人才正流向印度
item.description:
特朗普政府对一项深受在美工作的印度工程师欢迎的签证计划加征了新费用并设置了其他障碍。

【原文：

The Trump administration has put new fees and other barriers on a visa program popular among Indian engineers working in the US.

】

item.title: 波兰央行货币政策委员会委员杜达称，波兰可能在2月或3月重启降息周期
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会成员伊沃娜·杜达表示，由于通胀得到控制，波兰可能在下月或三月重启降息。【原文：Poland may resume interest rate cuts next month or in March as inflation is under control, according to Monetary Policy Council member Iwona Duda.】

item.title: Pop Mart空头押注持续攀升，逆回购行情而上
item.description: 波普市场国际集团有限公司近两年来首次回购股份，未能动摇做空者的信心，尽管股价大幅反弹使他们的看跌押注风险日益加剧。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd.’s first share buyback in nearly two years has failed to shake the conviction of short sellers, even as a sharp rally makes their bearish bets increasingly risky.】

item.title: 租赁设备共享平台EquipmentShare.com在美国IPO中筹集7.473亿美元
item.description: EquipmentShare.com公司通过在美国首次公开募股（IPO）筹集了7.473亿美元，其股票定价处于市场发行价区间的中心点。【原文：EquipmentShare.com Inc. raised $747.3 million in its US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the midpoint of the marketed range.】

item.title: 加密社交平台将向风险投资方偿还1.8亿美元
item.description: 一家加密货币社交媒体平台背后的软件公司计划向风险投资方偿还其投资的1.8亿美元，这凸显了区块链市场中最具雄心壮志的领域之一正经历整合期。【原文：The software firm behind a crypto-oriented social-media platform plans to repay venture capitalists the $180 million they had invested in the project, underscoring a period of consolidation for one of the more ambitious corners of the blockchain market.】

item.title: 印度因卢比暴跌取消更多南美大豆油订单
item.description: 作为全球最大的植物油买家，印度取消了更多来自南美的大豆油订单，因卢比汇率跌至历史新低，导致本土油品与进口油品的价格差距扩大。【原文：India, the world’s largest vegetable oil buyer, canceled more soybean oil shipments from South America as the rupee’s slump to a record low widened the price gap between local and imported oil.】

item.title: 策略师称日元料维持疲软态势，因日本央行维持政策不变
item.description: 策略师们认为，日本央行如预期维持利率不变后，日元近期疲软态势恐难止住，他们将此决定视为略带鹰派倾向。【原文：The yen is unlikely to stanch its recent weakness after the Bank of Japan held rates as expected, according to strategists, who saw the decision as tilting slightly hawkish.】

item.title: 新兴市场随黄金飙升，去美元化进程加速
item.description: 新兴市场股票、大宗商品、货币及贵金属延续了2026年开局以来的强劲涨势，因美欧紧张局势拖累美元汇率，并重新点燃了"抛售美国资产"的讨论。【原文：Emerging-market stocks, commodities, currencies and precious metals are extending a storming start to 2026 as tensions between the US and Europe weigh on the dollar and re-energize the “Sell America” debate.】

item.title: 越南因违反政府数据同意规则对TikTok处以罚款
item.description: 越南监管机构对字节跳动旗下的TikTok处以8.8亿越南盾（约合33,516美元）罚款，理由是该平台误导消费者关于其与企业的关系，并违反了消费者保护和数据同意规则。【原文：Vietnam regulators fined ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok 880 million dong ($33,516) for misleading consumers about their relationship with businesses and violating consumer protection and data consent rules.】

item.title: 央行创纪录注资巩固市场鸽派立场
item.description: 中国央行1月通过长期流动性工具向银行体系注入创纪录资金，强化了其货币宽松政策立场，并以充裕流动性支撑市场。【原文：China’s central bank injected a record amount of funds into the banking system through longer-dated liquidity tools in January, reinforcing its commitment to monetary easing and supporting markets with ample liquidity.】

item.title: Juspay新一轮融资估值达12亿美元
item.description: 印度支付技术供应商Juspay Technologies Pvt.在由WestBridge Capital领投的新一轮融资中获得资金，公司估值由此提升至约12亿美元。【原文：Indian payments technology provider Juspay Technologies Pvt. has raised fresh funds in a round led by WestBridge Capital that boosts the company’s valuation to about $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 铜价逼近13,000美元，随着其他金属价格上涨，铜价涨势加速
item.description: 铜价攀升至每吨13,000美元附近，在美元走弱及投资者普遍撤离货币和主权债券的背景下，铜价与其他金属同步上涨。【原文：Copper climbed toward $13,000 a ton, rising along with other metals on dollar weakness and a broad investor rotation away from currencies and sovereign bonds.】

item.title: 日元兑美元汇率走弱，因日本央行维持基准利率不变
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率不变后，日元汇率走弱，一度下跌0.2%至1美元兑158.74日元。【原文：The yen weakened after the Bank of Japan left its benchmark interest rate unchanged, falling as much as 0.2% to 158.74 to a dollar.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变，同时上调通胀预期
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率不变，以观察上月加息对经济的影响，并等待2月8日提前大选的结果。【原文：The Bank of Japan held its benchmark rate unchanged as it monitors the impact on the economy of last month’s hike and awaits the outcome of a snap election called for Feb. 8.】

item.title: 新西兰联储的布雷曼为支持鲍威尔捍卫美联储独立性
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长安娜·布雷曼为支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的决定辩护，此前该国外交部长批评她此举干涉美国内政。【原文：Reserve Bank of New Zealand Governor Anna Breman defended her decision to back Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, after the move drew a rebuke from the South Pacific nation’s foreign minister for straying into US politics.】

item.title: 据称GDS支持的DayOne计划在美国IPO中寻求200亿美元估值
item.description: 知情人士透露，DayOne数据中心有限公司计划在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中寻求高达200亿美元的估值，这将较其近期融资轮次大幅提升。【原文：DayOne Data Centers Ltd. is targeting a valuation as high as $20 billion in its planned US initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be a substantial increase from recent funding rounds.】

item.title: 遭受重创的小盘股和中盘股重回印度基金经理的视野
item.description: ICICI Prudential共同基金今日起重新开放其小盘股基金。【原文：ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund is reopening its small-cap fund from today.】

item.title: 为何印尼盾在1月份创下历史新低
item.description: 印尼盾已持续数月承压，投资者对该国财政前景及经济政策走向日益担忧。尽管央行出手干预以缓和贬值趋势，但这些担忧仍推动印尼盾兑美元汇率在1月份跌至历史新低。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah has been under sustained pressure for months as investors grow uneasy about the country’s fiscal outlook and the direction of economic policy. Those concerns pushed the currency to a record low against the dollar in January, despite intervention by the central bank to smooth its decline.】

item.title: 新西兰联储的布雷曼拒绝推迟加息预期
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长安娜·布雷曼拒绝反驳市场对今年加息的预期，其表态较数周前已出现转变。【原文：Reserve Bank of New Zealand Governor Anna Breman declined to push back against market expectations for an interest-rate hike this year, a shift in tone from comments she made just weeks ago.】

item.title: 莫迪政党在州选举中占据优势，坐拥巨额现金储备
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪领导的人民党拥有近13亿美元的现金储备，而其主要竞争对手的现金储备仅为该数额的6.6%，这使印度执政党在关键邦选举前占据显著优势。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party has a cash stockpile of nearly $1.3 billion while its main rival has just 6.6% of that amount, giving India’s ruling party a strong advantage ahead of key state elections.】

item.title: 借贷狂欢如九十年代，但万亿级考验迫在眉睫
item.description: 本周，信用投资者对全球市场罕见的剧烈波动不以为意，但随着美国投资级企业债券的收益率溢价降至近三十年来最低水平，他们即将面临重大考验。【原文：Credit investors who shrugged off an historic bout of global volatility this week are about to face a major test after yield premiums on US investment-grade corporate debt shrunk to their lowest in about three decades.】

item.title: 中国正以创纪录的速度向海湾国家提供贷款，深化合作关系
item.description: 海湾地区正迅速成为中国下一个重大金融布局的重要组成部分，多年来外交上的示好如今正转化为真金白银。【原文：The Gulf is fast emerging as part of China’s next big financial play, with years of diplomatic overtures now translating into hard cash.】

item.title: 印度国债销售加深其远离美元资产的转向
item.description: 印度持有的美国国债已降至五年低点，该国正致力于支撑本国货币并实现储备多元化，此举与部分主要经济体撤离全球最大债券市场的更广泛趋势相呼应。【原文：India’s holdings of US Treasuries have fallen to a five-year low as the nation pushes to support its currency and diversify its reserves, joining a broader shift by some major economies out of the world’s biggest bond market.】

item.title: 韩国SK海力士和三星受益于强劲的内存需求
item.description: 随着内存芯片需求回升，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的核心供应商SK海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.）应能在更广泛的半导体领域展现日益强劲的增长势头。【原文：Nvidia Corp. key supplier SK Hynix Inc. should demonstrate increasingly powerful momentum across the broader semiconductor sector as demand for memory chips picks up.】
